name: voyager-rn
description: React Native Expo version of voyager-pwa with identical functionality

scripts.test:mobile: cd automation && ANDROID_HOME=/Users/icebergslim/Library/Android/sdk PATH=$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools:$PATH npm run test:android
scripts.test:mobile:android: cd automation && ANDROID_HOME=/Users/icebergslim/Library/Android/sdk PATH=$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools:$PATH npm run test:android
scripts.test:mobile:android:headed: cd automation && ANDROID_HOME=/Users/icebergslim/Library/Android/sdk PATH=$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools:$PATH npm run test:android:headed:clean
scripts.test:mobile:android:headless: cd automation && ANDROID_HOME=/Users/icebergslim/Library/Android/sdk PATH=$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools:$PATH npm run test:android:headless
